metadata.description: Physical descriptions for lowColor characters from the Red Rising series for DALL-E image generation

colorTraits.Red: Red-tinted hair (rusty red, deep crimson, auburn), red-tinged eyes, typically shorter stature (under 5'5"), compact muscular builds from hard labor, weathered skin
colorTraits.Gray: Gray-tinted hair (steel gray, silver), gray eyes, military bearing, athletic/combat-ready builds, often scarred from military service
colorTraits.Blue: Blue-tinted hair and eyes, tall thin builds, pale skin from ship life, often have cybernetic implants for navigation
colorTraits.Pink: Genetically engineered for beauty, flawless skin, graceful movements, typically have pink-tinted features, designed for pleasure and companionship

metadata.imagePromptNotes: All prompts should end with: Red Rising sci-fi fantasy style, dramatic lighting, dark atmospheric background, digital art portrait, single person only, no text, no piercings

characters.name: Lyria of Lagalos
